'Riverdale' star Cole Sprouse shared a series of intimate photos with Lili Reinhart to celebrate her birthday

Close icon Two crossed lines that form an 'X'. It indicates a way to close an interaction, or dismiss a notification.
description: The two actors star as Jughead Jones and Betty Cooper on the hit CW show. They reportedly started dating in 2017 and slammed breakup reports in July.
